name: Thunder Kid
description: Take on the forces of the Robot Empire in this Low-Poly 3D Run 'n' Gun Action Game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
